text.__SUMMARY__:
Millettia sericantha is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Tanzania.
text.Sources: Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. (1998). "Millettia sericantha". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T32271A9692280. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T32271A9692280.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
